nodes.text: The Xi Charrians, also known simply as the Xi Char or Charrians, were the sentient insectoid inhabitants of the planet Xi Char. They were behind the Haor Chall Engineering Corporation company, which notably designed the Sheathipede-class transport shuttle, the Sheathipede-class Type B shuttle, and the Vulture-class starfighters, which they built in their cathedral factories. They notably believed in short quick answers to their problems, and this carried over into their starfighter designs.
